meanings.sent1: She is a rejecting person who never changes her mind.
meanings.sent2: The rejecting attitude of the teacher made the students feel unwelcome.
meanings.sent3: The rejecting cat turned away from the new toy with a disdainful look.
meanings.sent4: The rejecting clouds refused to let any sunlight through, casting a gloomy shadow.
meanings.sent5: The rejecting door remained closed, blocking any entry into the room.

meanings.sent1: After rejecting the broken toy, she threw it in the trash.
meanings.sent2: The company was rejecting defective products to maintain quality.
meanings.sent3: He was rejecting old habits like throwing away expired food.
meanings.sent4: The river was rejecting debris, carrying it away downstream.
meanings.sent5: The machine was rejecting faulty coins, returning them to the user.

meanings.sent1: His rejecting comments about the project dampened the team's spirits.
